item.title: Senior Expert in Wildlife Trade (TL)
item.author: Penny Buckle
item.description:
PSF - Legal and illegal trade in wildlife species between the EU and Mexico

The project aims to provide a comprehensive analysis of the trade of CITES listed species between Mexico and the EU (whether legally or illegally traded), in order to pave the way towards the development and implementation of actions to ensure their conversation, and guarantee that their trade is legal, sustainable and traceable.

  • Master Degree in wildlife monitoring, conservation and trade, environmental science and policy or related fields;
  • Extensive experience (at least 5 years) in monitoring legal and illegal wildlife trade, and contributing to wildlife trade analysis and policies;
  • Extensive knowledge of the CITES Convention and related wildlife trade policies;
  • Proven research and writing skills as well as strong analytical skills;
  • Proven previous experience as team leader coordinating a pool of experts in research projects;
  • Strong management skills;
  • Excellent communication and presentation skills
  • Fluency in English and Spanish
